title: File an Appeal on an Audit Decision
description: A client disagrees with the final decision of an IRS audit and wants to appeal.

tasks.description: Review the final audit report (Revenue Agent Report) and the client's objections.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the points of disagreement.

tasks.description: Prepare a formal protest letter outlining the client's position and the laws that support it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a detailed legal and factual argument.

tasks.description: File the protest letter with the IRS Appeals Office within the specified time limit.
